game.name: Little Squirrel Cabin
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Little Squirrel Cabin is a psychological survival horror set in a place that was once cozy and peaceful, but is now about to be struck by unprecedented trials.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Little Squirrel Cabin is a psychological survival horror set in a place that was once cozy and peaceful, but is now about to be struck by unprecedented trials.
